title: Whole30 Roasted Veg & Sausage
description: A savory, sheet-pan dinner of caramelized root vegetables and herbed chicken sausage roasted until tender and slightly charred. Bright lemon and fresh herbs finish the dish for a simple, Whole30-compliant weeknight meal with robust savory flavors.

ingredients.notes: leave whole or halved on the bias

ingredients.display_name: sweet potato, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
carrots, cut on a diagonal into 1/2-inch slices
red bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1-inch pieces

ingredients.notes: leave smashed to roast, remove if desired
use zest and ~1 tbsp juice for finishing

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C). Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment or lightly oil it to prevent sticking.

Prepare the vegetables: peel and cube the sweet potato, slice the carrots, halve the brussels sprouts, core and chop the bell pepper, and cut the red onion into wedges. Smash the garlic cloves but leave them mostly intact.

In a large bowl, combine all prepared vegetables and smashed garlic. Add olive oil, chopped rosemary, thyme, salt, black pepper, and red pepper flakes if using. Toss until vegetables are evenly coated.
Arrange the seasoned vegetables in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet, leaving space in the center or on one side for the sausages.
Place whole or halved sausages on the baking sheet among the vegetables, cut side down if halved. Drizzle any remaining oil from the bowl over the sausages and vegetables.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, then remove the sheet and use a spatula to turn vegetables and rotate sausages for even browning.
Return the sheet to the oven and roast for an additional 7 minutes, or until sausages are cooked through (internal temp 165°F/74°C for poultry) and vegetables are tender and caramelized at the edges.

Remove from oven, squeeze lemon juice and sprinkle lemon zest over the pan. Toss gently to combine, adjust seasoning to taste, and let rest for 2–3 minutes before serving. Garnish with a few extra thyme leaves if desired.
